column5: when is the season closed is it the 15th or the 7th? I have been given 2 answers. When are huts off and when is the season closed? thanks
March 15th at midnite. Huts off the lake by March 31st.

I will most likly take my hut off on the 15th. 17th at the latest. Why leave it out where you can't fish? Pretty sure we will be able to pull them off with trucks then so don't want to wait for the melt.
I am going up in the morning for a couple days and i would like to get back up on the march break week again for a couple more.
